Text: ['The journey is still going on. We are ready for a new chapter. Welcome back, Commandant.', 'Generous Rewards for Inviting Commandants Back']
['The journey is yet to end, with a new chapter poised to unfold. Your return has been long-awaited. Welcome back, Commandant!', 'Invite Friends Back for Bountiful Rewards']
